lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko stopped his former sparring partner Tony Thompson with a right hand in the 11th round Saturday to defend his heavyweight title in Berlin. Klitschko (51-3, 45 knockouts) turned boos to cheers as Thompson went to the canvas 1 minute 38 seconds into the round. The knockout came after an ugly 10th round in which Klitschko pushed Thompson to the canvas and fell upon him.
